text: Birtamode (Nepali: बिर्तामोड नगरपालिका) is a municipality in Jhapa District of Nepal. It is the commercial, educational and transportation center of Jhapa District. The nearest local towns connected to Birtamod are Sarnamati Bazar, Shivasatakshi Bazar, Kamatoli Bazar, Chakchaki Bazar and Surunga Bazar. Birtamod is the largest city of Jhapa. == Images == Birtamode city of jhapa district.JPG Birtamode city of jhapa district1.JPG Birtamode city of jhapa district2.JPG Birtamode city of jhapa district3.JPG Birtamode city of jhapa district4.JPG Category:Municipalities of Nepal Category:Cities in Nepal
title: Birtamod Municipality
